extensionDescription.message: Disables or enables sending of the referrer. An optional spoofing feature sends spoofed referrers to problematic servers.

title_enabled.description: Text displayed in the title if referrer is ON.

title_disabled.description: Text displayed in the title if referrer is OFF.

spoofing_label.description: Label for the spoofing toggle in the options page

spoofing_info.message: The optional referrer spoofing feature sends a spoofed referrer to some problematic servers in case you disabled referrer sending (no red flag next to toolbar button).

permissions_info.message: If you opt in to this feature, then additional permissions are requested by Firefox to allow us to modify the referrer header.
